auto_copy.message: Automaticaly copy picked color to clipboard

cancel_desc.message: Simply cancel active picking color from web page. No color will be stored in history.

change_at.message: You can change this shortcut at Chrome's

click_action.message: Click icon to pick color from web page

command_desc.message: Activate pick color from web page

disable_right_click.message: Disable pick with right mouse click

do_not_copy.message: Do not copy # character, only RGB color

drop_desc.message: move mouse over icon to see how it looks like

empty_history.message: History is empty, try to pick some color first.

enable_box.message: Enable box with color information in right bottom corner

enable_color.message: Enable color tooltip next to the mouse cursor

extension_description.message: Color Picker for Chrome quickly selects colours from the page using the eyedropper and automatically when browsing the web.

option_legend3.message: Keyboard Shortcuts for Pick Color from Web Page

update_desc.message: Color Picker shows you only color which was present at moment of color pick active. If any javascript event occures (hover effect, menu appears) you can refresh its "cache" with this keyboard shortcut.
